hero.title: IPO Compliance Plans
hero.description: Comprehensive IPO compliance plans to ensure all legal, administrative, and regulatory aspects are fulfilled before, during, and after IPO. Navigate regulatory requirements with confidence and transparency.

objectives.title: Purpose of IPO Compliance Plans
objectives.description: Our IPO compliance plans ensure comprehensive regulatory adherence and risk mitigation throughout the IPO process.

items.title: Ensure Comprehensive Compliance
items.description: Ensure all legal, administrative, and regulatory aspects are fulfilled before, during, and after IPO.

items.title: Avoid Regulatory Obstacles
items.description: Prevent obstacles and penalties from OJK and BEI regulatory authorities through proactive compliance.

items.title: Maintain Transparency & Accountability
items.description: Maintain transparency, accountability, and regulatory compliance continuity as a public company.

components.title: Main Components of IPO Compliance
components.description: Our comprehensive compliance framework covers all critical regulatory and legal requirements for successful IPO execution.

items.title: Legal and Administrative Document Preparation
items: Articles of Association amendments (AD/ART) according to BEI requirements
Audited shareholder register
Board of directors and commissioners statements
Material contracts and important agreements

items.title: Financial Reporting Audit
items: Minimum 2 years audit by OJK-registered KAP
Latest interim financial reports if IPO is conducted mid-year
Financial reports must comply with PSAK and be published openly

items.title: Information Disclosure Standards Compliance
items: Complete prospectus preparation
Required disclosures including: financial, risk, ownership structure, projects, IPO fund usage, and potential conflicts of interest
Periodic reports and information disclosure post-IPO (quarterly & annually)

items.title: Corporate Governance (GCG)
items: Implementation of transparency, accountability, responsibility, independence, fairness principles
Establishment of audit committee and internal audit unit
Preparation of BOD & BOC work guidelines

items.title: Internal Reporting and Documentation Systems
items: ERP system or document management application preparation
Standardization of financial and non-financial reporting
Material information and incident reporting procedures according to regulations

process.title: IPO Compliance Plan Process Flow
process.description: Our systematic approach ensures comprehensive compliance preparation and ongoing regulatory adherence for successful IPO execution.

steps.title: Identify OJK/BEI Regulatory Obligations
steps.description: Comprehensive mapping of all regulatory requirements and obligations from OJK and BEI for IPO preparation.

steps.title: Prepare Legal & Financial Documents
steps.description: Systematic preparation of all required legal documents, financial reports, and administrative requirements.

steps.title: Independent Audit and Review
steps.description: Conduct thorough independent audits and reviews by qualified parties to ensure compliance standards.

steps.title: Prepare Prospectus & Information Disclosure
steps.description: Develop comprehensive prospectus and establish information disclosure procedures for transparency.

steps.title: Implement Governance & Reporting Systems
steps.description: Establish corporate governance framework and internal reporting systems for public company operations.

steps.title: Submit to OJK & BEI + Post-IPO Monitoring
steps.description: Complete regulatory submissions and establish ongoing monitoring systems for post-IPO compliance.

items.title: IPO Registration Documents to OJK and BEI
items.description: Complete and compliant documentation package ready for submission to regulatory authorities.

items.title: Final Prospectus for Public Publication
items.description: Comprehensive prospectus document prepared for public disclosure and investor distribution.

items.title: Post-IPO Periodic Reporting System
items.description: Established systems and procedures for ongoing quarterly and annual reporting requirements.

items.title: Evidence of Capital Market Regulation Compliance
items.description: Documentation demonstrating full compliance with all applicable capital market regulations.

benefits.title: Strategic Benefits
items: Ensure smooth IPO process without regulatory rejections or delays
Increase public and investor confidence through demonstrated compliance
Reduce legal and reputational risks in the future
Demonstrate company commitment to governance and transparency standards
